tool.name: GetArea
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayInputPolygon False output_data_Area $output_data_Area name GetArea InputPolygon $InputPolygon prefer $prefer response $response transmissionMode_Area $OutputSection_Area.transmissionMode_Area

param.name: InputPolygon
param.label: Polygon to compute are
param.help: URI to a set of GML that describes the polygon. The following data types are allowed in the txt file: xml

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_Area
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

tool.help: Computes the area of a geometry
